snippet: The capital of China will take part in a company initiative that includes the collection of emissions data to predict smog buildup.
abstract: IBM announces agreement with Beijing to use advanced weather forecasting and cloud computing technologies to help tackle the Chinese capital's persistent smog.
lead_paragraph: The capital of China will take part in a company initiative that includes the collection of emissions data to predict smog buildup.

headline.main: IBM Will Help Beijing Monitor Pollution
headline.print_headline: Beijing and IBM in Deal to Predict Heavy Smog
